title: Saved Preferences in Ranked Queue  [VOTE]
body:
It would be nice if you could save your lane preferences for every game rather then having to pick them every time you queue. This may not be a problem for some people but as someone who plays a lot it starts to get a little annoying. It's more a quality of life feature but something that would just polish the game as a whole. 

Vote below in the poll if you agree this feature should be added.
